content.text: Match ends, Almería 2, Villarreal 3.
Second Half ends, Almería 2, Villarreal 3.
Kiu (Almería) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Bruno Soriano (Villarreal).
Hernán Pellerano (Almería) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Substitution, Almería. Óscar Díaz replaces Sebastián Dubarbier.
Goal!  Almería 2, Villarreal 3. Jonathan Pereira (Villarreal) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Giovani dos Santos following a fast break.
Attempt blocked. Rodri (Almería) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Corona.
Substitution, Almería. Kiu replaces Fernando Soriano.
Goal!  Almería 2, Villarreal 2. Giovani dos Santos (Villarreal) left footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Javier Aquino.
